high_descs: Turn left to face the black stand.
Take the cardboard roll from the stand.
Turn around, go towards the sink, turn right, go to the toilet paper roll holder.
Put the cardboard roll on the toilet paper roll holder.
anns.task_desc: Put a cardboard roll on a toilet paper roll holder.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the black table with the plant on it.
Take the roll that is next to the plant on the table.
Turn around and walk to the sink across the room then turn right and walk across the room to the toilet paper dispenser on the wall.
Place the roll on the dispenser on the wall.
anns.task_desc: To place the toilet paper roll on the dispenser.

high_descs: Turn left to the black table beside you.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll
Turn around and head toward the toilet on the right
Place the empty toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder that is on the wall next to the toilet
anns.task_desc: Place an empty toilet paper roll on a toilet paper holder.
